# WRBcalibrates

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

WRBcalibrates is a package to aid the Yukon Water Resources Branch in collecting and storing calibration data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of WRBcalibrates like so:

``` r
devtools::install.github("YukonWRB/WRBcalibrates")
```
